changes: The Endo Army's Lasers now do 30 damage instead of 60
The Endo Army's Lasers can now crit
Endo Army's now only last for 10 seconds instead of 16
technical: The `generic/menus_that_fade` data file now supports being loaded from multiple...
... namespaces, instead of just the game's default namespace
fixes: Fixed an issue with the game storing your settings in local storage
Fixed the buttons in the Controls and Change Logs menu scrolling incorrectly
